<acidbriggs@...> wrote:
>
> No, not new.  It's in the link I posted, but he=
re is the snippet:
>
>
> "Note
>
> By default, as of version 1.10.x, Heritr=
ix binds to localhost only.
> This means that you need to be running Heritr=
ix on the same machine as
> your browser to access the Heritrix UI. Read ab=
out the --bind argument
> above if you need to access the Heritrix UI over =
a network."
>
>
